title: Ring Around His Heart
description: 'Ring of mine ... pink in hueBring me love that sticks like glue ...'Margie Walker has the best intentions in the world, but it seems that no matter what she does, situations have a tendency to turn to chaos when she's involved. Her friends and family know it, and she knows it. It's just too bad that Jack Ivan doesn't ... but he's about to find out.It's not long after Jack elicits Margie's help with a personal problem that he begins to notice the strange things that take place whenever she's around. First, there is the lightning storm and then the plane crash. But after the riot, he's beginning to wonder if his life will ever return to normal, especially once Margie runs a ring around his heart.
author: C.J. Love
